tool_description: Avoid betting blocked while scraping. Scrape Box accepts URL from any web page and provide a clean HTML with a simple API call!
title: Scraper Box

api_list.name: /browseurl
api_list.description: Get HTML data of a URL page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Specify URL you want to scrape.
